tweet.text: Interested in historical documents? Love grammar and style guides? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program to work as a historian in the Editing and Publishing Division at @HistoryAtState. #PMF applications accepted from Sept. 28 to Oct. 12 https://t.co/9MdLibXAXh https://t.co/fR859vF0q9
